Content:
Assuming zcash is used like Pirate is.. mandatory privacy, You would want to find out if Grin is A)Mandatory Private, and B) if you really do need to be online to transact on MimbleWimble, which I have read.

If the answer to A is yes AND B is no, then you'll need to dig deeper.
